data.title: Divya Khossla pens heartfelt note to late Tishaa Kumar who died by cancer
data.meta_description: Divya Khossla shared a poignant tribute on Instagram to remember Tishaa Kumar, the daughter of T-Series co-owner Krishan Kumar. Tishaa, who passed away at the young age of 20 after a prolonged battle with cancer, was fondly remembered by her family and friends.
